title: Divya Haar: Diamond and Gemstone Statement Necklace
materials: Natural Pearls. Features a premium Hyderabadi Polish for lasting radiance.
features: This exquisite Haaram showcases a delicate floral pattern made of diamonds. The pendant features intricate filigree work around a central Emerald, topped with a smaller Ruby. Three lustrous South Sea Pearls are suspended from the pendant, adding a touch of grace. The unique diamond settings reflect the light beautifully, creating a dazzling effect.
colors: Predominantly gold and white (diamonds) with vibrant accents of red (ruby) and green (emerald). The pearls add a soft
occasions: and special occasions where you want to make a statement. Also suitable for elegant parties and cultural events.
description: This Divya Haar is a timeless masterpiece, blending traditional South Indian artistry with modern design sensibilities. The high-quality diamonds and gemstones ensure lasting brilliance, while the Hyderabadi polish guarantees enduring shine. It's a heirloom piece that will be treasured for generations.
